definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The tale was carried over to the next page.
See one of the most beautiful lighthouses on the next page.
sentences.chinese: 下頁請看一座最美麗的燈塔。

sentences.english: Please specify reasons for applying late payment of tuition fee in next page.
sentences.chinese: 請於下頁空位內填上閣下申請延期繳交學費的原因。

sentences.english: Please refer to next page for package details & remarks.
sentences.chinese: 請參閱下頁之套餐詳情及備註。
